avengers.name: Captain America
avengers.powers: enhanced strength, speed, durability, super-soldier fighting ability

avengers.name: Thor
avengers.powers: superhuman strength, durability, flight, control over lightning

avengers.name: Hulk
avengers.powers: limitless strength, durability, accelerated healing factor

avengers.name: Black Widow
avengers.powers: expert martial artist, espionage expert, advanced weaponry

avengers.name: Hawkeye
avengers.powers: master archer, exceptional athlete, expert tactician

avengers.name: Ant Man
avengers.powers: Size-shifting from nearly microscopic to ~100 feet gigantic (both at extremes) Ability to transfer his size-shifting ability to other beings and objects. Uses Pym particle discs that allow Ant-Man to will himself and other objects to reduce in size or enlarge. Maintains strength of normal size in shrunken state.
